summary: Directory CSV file is used for importing and exporting directory metadata. The CSV file can be used to create new directories or update existing ones within a drive service.

headers.name: description
headers.description: Description for the directory in Markdown format.
examples: This directory contains all project documents

headers.name: parent
headers.description: Fully qualified name of the parent directory. If not provided, this is a root directory.

headers.name: directoryType
headers.description: Type of directory (Folder, SharedFolder, MyDrive, TeamDrive).

headers.name: owners
headers.description: Owners of the directory. Multiple owners are separated by ';'. Each owner is specified as 'type:name' format.

headers.name: tags
headers.description: Fully qualified classification tag names associated with the directory separated by ';'.

headers.name: glossaryTerms
headers.description: Fully qualified glossary term names associated with the directory separated by ';'.

headers.name: domains
headers.description: Fully qualified names of the domains the directory belongs to, separated by ';'.

headers.name: dataProducts
headers.description: List of fully qualified names of data products this directory is part of, separated by ';'.

headers.name: experts
headers.description: Subject matter experts for this directory. Multiple experts are separated by ';'.

headers.name: reviewers
headers.description: Reviewers for this directory. Multiple reviewers are separated by ';'.
